dublinCore.title: 113 HR 2752 IH: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude seasonal workers from the applicable large employer determination for purposes of employer shared responsibility regarding health coverage.
dublinCore.rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Alexander introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude seasonal workers from the applicable large employer determination for purposes of employer shared responsibility regarding health coverage.

section.header: Seasonal workers disregarded in determining employer size for purposes of employer shared responsibility

subsection.text: Clause (i) of section 4980H(c)(2)(B) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended to read as follows:

clause.text: Seasonal workers shall not be taken into account for purposes of determining whether an employer is an applicable large employer under this paragraph.

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section shall apply to months beginning after December 31, 2013.
